Over the past 12 years, 1 million 500 thousand jobs have been created in Azerbaijan. Of these, 1 million are permanent jobs.
Over the past 12 years, 3,000 schools, 600 hospitals and 41 Olympic Sports Complexes have been built in Azerbaijan with the most up-to-date standards.
Over the past 12 years, 89 IDP settlements with modern social infrastructure have been established in Azerbaijan, 225,000 people have been relocated to new homes.
$ 200 billion has been invested in Azerbaijan's economy over the past 12 years. $ 100 billion of this is foreign investment.
More than 70,000 businesses have been created in Azerbaijan over the past 12 years, with 1.7 billion manat preferential loans granted to entrepreneurs.
Over the last 12 years, Azerbaijan has built a modern infrastructure of tourism, around 300 hotels and world-class resorts.
Over the past 12 years, the Baku-Tbilisi-Ceyhan oil pipeline, Baku-Tbilisi-Erzurum gas pipeline has been put into operation and the TANAP project has been launched.

Azerbaijan contributes to the solution of humanitarian issues in Syria and will continue its efforts in this direction in the future.
The main issue in Syria is the provision of peace, ceasefire, and the political settlement of the problem.
As a result of the aggression of Armenia in the early 1990s, Azerbaijan faced a humanitarian catastrophe and crisis in Syria.
Armenia has occupied 20% of Azerbaijan's territory, more than one million Azerbaijanis have become refugees and internally displaced persons.
Azerbaijan is aware of the way of ensuring the development of the country as a troublesome country and is ready to share its experience.
250,000 refugees have been provided with housing in Azerbaijan, and the poverty rate among refugees has dropped from 70% to 12%.
Over 1.5 million jobs have been created in Azerbaijan over the past ten years, poverty and unemployment have dropped by 5%, reaching 100% literacy levels.
Azerbaijan is a country that promotes peace and humanity, and will continue to play its important role in this field.

Brothers and Sisters We start our discussion session and at the beginning I would like to thank you all for the active participation by sending thousands of questions to the governments.
Many questions focused on our vision of the future government. I will answer them collectively and I hope that we cover the questions we have received.
The size of the changes around us and the magnitude of the ambitions we want for our people requires a new thought in the form of government and its mechanisms of action.
Change creates great opportunities, renews blood and ideas, and forces everyone to think differently. All that is good for our people will be applied.
We can not pass on to the future the tools of the past and can not achieve significant developmental leaps without thinking in a new way in the form of government # Global Summit_Governments
We want a young government capable of creating an environment for young people to realize their dreams and ready to act quickly to fulfill the aspirations of our people
The government must be flexible, we do not want a large number of ministries, but we want ministers who are more able to take up files every day.
The government that we want must be a government with insight. It can look to the future, prepare for it, and use its tools.
We want a government that does not just think about providing services, but also about building the skills of its people, and providing an environment for achieving achievements.
Happy New Year to all my Chinese friends.  May this year bring happiness and good fortune to you.
Government as we have always made the happiness of the human interest and the illusion and its daily occupancy .. And when we say that we mean literally # World Summit_Governments
Today, we are at the beginning of a new stage, which is the development of knowledge, support of science and research, and the exploitation of exceptional young energy
We want a people-centered government with its family, education, knowledge, well-being and aspirations to build its future and its inherent right to fulfill all its aspirations.
We want a government whose goal is to build a virtuous society, a tolerant environment, a cohesive family, educated generations and equal economic opportunities for all.
Our government completes ten years after the last ten days. It was a decimal building of systems, strategies and tools
The next decimal is the decisiveness of starting with confidence for the future with all its changes, challenges and competitiveness. # Global Summit for Governments
I would like to announce today to the people of the UAE that the President of the State, may God protect him, has adopted the largest structural changes in the history of the federal government
And that after consulting with my brother Mohammed bin Zayed ... a new structure of the federal government has been adopted
In the new government the role of ministers is strategic and organizational, and we will have a road map to outsource most government services to the private sector
The new government will include fewer ministries and more ministers to deal with dynamic and dynamic national and strategic files.

The changes include incorporating the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with two state ministers in support. #WorldGovSummit
We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an autonomous, semi-independent authority. #WorldGovSummit
We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources Council to restructure the development of our human resources #WorldGovSummit
An independent entity will oversee public hospitals in the UAE: a structural change to the Ministry of Health's portfolio. #WorldGovSummit
We are also reforming the Ministry of Labor to better manage the UAE work in this new era of development. #WorldGovSummit
The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education. #WorldGovSummit
Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development. #WorldGovSummit

Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment #WorldGovSummit
We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit
The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs #WorldGovSummit
The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future. #WorldGovSummit
The post of Minister of State for Tolerance has been created to promote tolerance as a fundamental value in UAE society #WorldGovSummit

The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists #WorldGovSummit
The newly created UAE Youth National Council will include an elite group of young men and women to advise on youth affairs #WorldGovSummit

We held today the first meeting of the Council of Ministers after the new formation ... Government of the future in the spirit of youth and positive energy https://t.co/5x4Dti8z1u

I asked the ministers, especially the newcomers and those who have undergone a major change in their structures and functions, to start developing their programs, plans and initiatives for the first 100 days.

The change that we have made will be followed by new ways and tools in government work. The way is not the size of countries, but their speed and their real commitment to fulfill the aspirations of their people.
We also decided today to reshape the Ministerial Council of Services under the chairmanship of Brother Mansour bin Zayed .. and rename it as "Ministerial Council for Development"

The Ministerial Council for Development will lead national government policies and programs in line with the directives of the Head of State and the aspirations of our people for a new phase of our development march

We decided to establish the Education and Human Resources Council under the chairmanship of Brother Abdullah bin Zayed and with him 7 other ministers and the Council's goal is to prepare a dictionary that matches our future aspirations

We have adopted the Emirates Youth Council under the chairmanship of Shama Al Mazroui. The members of the Council will be young and young. The goal is to convey their aspirations and support to find solutions to their challenges.
We also decided to establish the Council of Emirates Scientists, headed by Sara Al Amiri. The Council's goal is to build a generation of national scientists in various scientific fields
We have adopted the establishment of Emirates Health Services Corporation to manage and operate state hospitals and raise the quality and standards of services provided to citizens

And we decided to establish the Emirates Foundation for School Education for the management and operation of public schools .. The Foundation will have a board of directors and a special director general of the Council of Ministers
The next period is a period of change in government and I ask all working teams to cooperate to accomplish this change easily and quickly, and we all promise that the next is better, God willing

We approved reforming the Ministerial Council for Services headed by Sheikh Mansour Bin Zayed as the Ministerial Council for Development.
The Council will lead national policies and government programs in line with the president's directives and our people's aspirations.
We approved forming the Education and HR Council chaired by Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed and 7 ministers, to prepare our human capital.
We approved forming the National Council for UAE Youth headed by Shamma Al Mazrui to represent youth's aspirations, ideas and solutions
We also approved forming the UAE Council of Scientists headed by Sarah Al Amiri, to prepare a generation of national scientists in all areas
We approved forming the Emirates Healthcare Establishment to run and operate our government hospitals and promote the quality of services.
We approved forming the Emirates School Establishment. to run and operate government schools, with a board and DG appointed by the cabinet.
The government is going through a phase of change. I ask all our teams to work together to achieve this change quickly and smoothly.
